item.description: "Great food without the attitude" Gargoyles on the Square offers an award winning innovative modern American Cuisine with Asian inflections without the pretentious prices. Located in Davis Square, this delightful, somewhat upscale neighborhood establishment over the past decade has evolved into one of Boston's best restaurants without losing its local flair. Boston Magazine named it the Best Neighborhood Restaurant for the past 3 years. With Huge windows in the lounge and quit candle lit earth toned dining room, Gargoyles is a funky, beautiful, relaxed and fun place to dine.
item.name: Gargoyles on the Square
